summary.overview: This batch job reads and processes credit card data from a VSAM file system. The job generates reports and processing results for business analysis and monitoring purposes.
business_functions: Read card data from VSAM card database
Generate card processing reports and output messages

READCARD.jcl.program_overview: Processes card data from VSAM file and generates business reports
